amendatorysection.catchline: Visitation; Department of Health and Human Services; power.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Health and Human Services, or such person as it may authorize, may visit any child so placed, who has not been legally adopted, with a view of ascertaining whether such child is being properly cared for and living under moral surroundings.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. VI, art. II, div. XI, § 5, p. 790;
